reasoning: As cofounder of Cohere, Nick Frosst has clear evidence of exceptional ability through shipping frontier models like SOTA translation (outperforming GPT-5), open-weight reasoning and vision models, on-prem LLMs, and overseeing >100 research papers. Tweets demonstrate technical depth in model specialization, reasoning-tool use decoupling, and enterprise deployment, aligning with xAI's stack (transformers, training optimizations). While ownership is team-attributed rather than personal code/ships, leadership in building competitive AI systems shows mission obsession and initiative over careerism.
exceptional_work: Cofounder of Cohere: shipped SOTA translation model outperforming GPT-5, open-weight reasoning/vision models, on-prem LLMs, >100 papers, $500M raised for frontier enterprise AI.
